_source.short_desc: 75health platform is easy to use and helps doctors, clinics, and hospitals to stay up-to-date. Streamlining the process to cloud-based
_source.long_desc:
Healthcare is changing, and electronic health record software is at the forefront of that change. 75Health saves time and money for both patients and doctors. In addition, it can simplify doctors' work by providing intelligent systems that work more efficiently. Cloud-based technology is also more secure and cost-efficient than traditional paper records. 

75Health creates an environment of trust and collaboration between doctor and patient.
_source.target_audience: Doctors, clinics, hospitals and for individual practitioners.

category_features.name: Appointment Scheduling
category_features.definition: Book appointments via calendar

category_features.name: Charting
category_features.definition: An electronic record of patients, clinical documentation, created and stored digitally

category_features.name: Compliance Tracking
category_features.definition: Track business operations to ensure they are performed correctly and according to industry regulations

category_features.name: E-Prescribing
category_features.definition: Electronic prescribing of a medical prescriptions

category_features.name: HIPAA Compliant
category_features.definition: Compliant with HIPAA, which sets standards for sensitive patient data protection

category_features.name: Handwriting Recognition
category_features.definition: Enter information through handwriting on a tablet

category_features.name: Meaningful Use Certified
category_features.definition: Adheres to meaningful use standards

category_features.name: ONC-ATCB Certified
category_features.definition: Certified for health IT

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Voice Recognition
category_features.definition: Recognize/detect varying frequencies in a person?s voice to identify/verify "who" is speaking

category_features.name: Claims Management
category_features.definition: Automates the entire process of creating and submitting claims.

category_features.name: Claims Scrubbing
category_features.definition: Clean up of claims prior to their submission, while validating to determine claims are appropriate and accurate

category_features.name: Code & Charge Entry
category_features.definition: Assigning monetary value to patients' accounts as per medical codes and appropriate fee schedule.

category_features.name: Compliance Tracking
category_features.definition: Track business operations to ensure they are performed correctly and according to industry regulations

category_features.name: Customizable Dashboard
category_features.definition: Alter the layout and content of dashboards

category_features.name: Dunning Management
category_features.definition: Process of automatically notifying clients when payments fail to ensure invoices are paid

category_features.name: Insurance Eligibility Verification
category_features.definition: Checking eligibility of patients for different insurance claims.

category_features.name: Invoice History
category_features.definition: Store and view prior invoices for each account/client

category_features.name: Practice Management
category_features.definition: Managing day-to-day operations of a medical practice such as scheduling appointments, generating reports and more.

category_features.name: Quotes/Estimates
category_features.definition: Generate quotes and estimates forms to send to customers

category_features.name: Remittance Advice
category_features.definition: Document insurance payer providing an explanation of benefits (EOB).

related_products.short_desc: Our award-winning healthcare IT solutions give providers greater control, so they can focus on what they do best.
related_products.features: athenaOne organizes the moment of care, performs administrative and quality services to ensure full payment, and tracks all physician orders so doctors can focus on what they do best. Deliver high quality care. With athenaOne, Doctors benefit from continuous access to the best practices of the nation's largest clinical network, the most up-to-date and extensive quality rules and industry guidelines, and 24/7 support.

related_products.short_desc: DrChrono eRx makes prescription writing a snap. Send e-prescriptions of regular & controlled substances anytime on iPad, iPhone or web.
related_products.features: DrChrono eRx makes prescription writing a snap. Pick single, multiple or compound prescriptions, check for drug interactions and medication history, and directly e-prescribe using an iPhone, iPad or web. DrChrono EHR is EPCS compliant and also fully compliant with DEA, NIST and Surescripts requirements, so you can legally e-prescribe Schedule II-V drugs from anywhere with the highest level of security and fraud protection. View patient coverage and co-pay amount for each prescription.

related_products.short_desc: Safer, faster, EPCS-certified e-prescribing from anywhere with RXNT's industry-leading, intuitive, mobile E-Prescribing software.
related_products.features: RXNT's cloud-based, intuitive Electronic Prescribing (eRx) software is EPCS-certified and PDMP-connected, allowing providers to easily, accurately write electronic prescriptions from anywhere. Improve patient compliance with price transparency and easy prescription renewals. Keep patients safe with drug/allergy interaction checks, real-time medication history, and Electronic Prior Authorization. Plus, our E-Prescribing mobile app is available for iOS and Android devices.

related_products.short_desc: Cerner Ambulatory supports more than 55 specialties by delivering integrated clinical and financial solutions and services.
related_products.features: Cerner's PowerChart Ambulatory EHR ensures the right clinicians have the right information at the right time and place to make the best possible decisions. We believe that with information technology and coordination, health care becomes safer, more effective and available to communities worldwide.

related_products.short_desc: A certified e-prescribing system that can run stand-alone or integrate with EHR/PMs.
related_products.features: MDToolbox's e-Prescribing software can run stand-alone or integrate with EHRs. Sending prescriptions electronically including EPCS has never been easier no matter what device you're on - desktop, tablet, or phone. Easily find drugs, check Rx histories and PMPs, get real-time prescription benefit info, prescribe using favorite lists, etc. It's also Surescripts certified and one of the only Meaningful Use Stage 3 certified stand alone e-Rx products. Try it out today with a free 30 day trial!

related_products.short_desc: ChartLogic offers a full ambulatory EHR suite designed to intuitively understand your workflow, specialty and personal preference.
related_products.features: ChartLogic, Inc. offers a full ambulatory EHR suite, including electronic medical record, practice management, revenue cycle management, e-prescribing, patient portal and more. Although ChartLogic includes hundreds of distinct features, it's the overall charting experience that sets it apart: truly easy, incredibly flexible and super fast. You can produce a complete note in <90 seconds. Literally. In addition to primary care, we cater to surgical and other complex areas of medicine.

related_products.short_desc: Intelligent Medical Software (IMS) by Meditab, is an award-winning, all-in-one EHR, practice management, and billing platform.
related_products.features: IMS caters to every step of the patient care delivery process, from patient engagement to telehealth, practice analytics, automated check-in, care coordination, reporting, and more. Its multi-specialty features, modules, and templates were built from the ground up to adapt to the exact needs of over 40 specialties.

related_products.short_desc: Elation's clinical-first EHR is designed and built for independent primary care practices and physicians.
related_products.features: Since 2010, the company has delivered clinical-first solutions - built on an award-winning collaborative EHR platform - that help practices start, grow, communicate, and succeed in delivering the highest quality personalized care to patients. Elation Health supports primary care providers in upholding the craft of medicine while thriving in an evolving healthcare landscape. Today, Elation Health serves 23,000 active clinicians at 2,100 clinics, caring for 9.3 million Americans.

related_products.short_desc: A free platform for pharmacists and health care providers that links them directly with PBMs, health plans and medicine manufacturers.
related_products.features: A free platform for pharmacists and health care providers that links them directly with PBMs, health plans and medicine manufacturers.

related_products.short_desc: E-prescribe without an EHR.
related_products.features:
E-prescribe without an EHR. Treat is accessible from any web browser as a standalone eprescribing app. Your most frequently prescribed medications can be saved as favorites, accessible when and where you need them.

Improve your patients experience and meet state mandates for electronic prescribing without having to adopt clunky EHR software. Sign up and start sending eprescriptions today.

similar_products.short_desc: Web-based electronic prescribing application for use by all provider specialties.
similar_products.features: Daw Systems, Inc. develops web-based ScriptSure Cloud Electronic Prescribing.  ScriptSure Cloud E-Prescribing application has been ranked #1.  The product is the 2021 recipient of the electronic network white coat award for most accurate prescriptions.  ScriptSure combines up-to-date First Databank drug databases, full SureScripts network connectivity, Electronic Prescribing of Controlled Substances (EPCS), web-based access and the best work-flow methods to deliver the best in E-Prescribing.

Improve your patients experience and meet state mandates for electronic prescribing without having to adopt clunky EHR software. Sign up and start sending eprescriptions today.

similar_products.short_desc: Kareo's e-Prescribe makes it easy to engage with your patients. Manage patient interactions simply with Kareo Clinical.
similar_products.features: Easily e-Prescribe with our full-featured EHR, designed by a practicing physician to fit the way you think and work. Let us show you how easy it is to write notes and prescriptions, code encounters, and manage patients in our fully integrated, cloud-based EHR. Read below to explore the various features of Kareo Clinical..

similar_products.short_desc: DrChrono eRx makes prescription writing a snap. Send e-prescriptions of regular & controlled substances anytime on iPad, iPhone or web.
similar_products.features: DrChrono eRx makes prescription writing a snap. Pick single, multiple or compound prescriptions, check for drug interactions and medication history, and directly e-prescribe using an iPhone, iPad or web. DrChrono EHR is EPCS compliant and also fully compliant with DEA, NIST and Surescripts requirements, so you can legally e-prescribe Schedule II-V drugs from anywhere with the highest level of security and fraud protection. View patient coverage and co-pay amount for each prescription.

similar_products.short_desc: Netsmart OrderConnect is HIPAA-compliant solution and certified for Electronic Prescribing of Controlled Substances (EPCS).
similar_products.features: Netsmart OrderConnect is a web-based, HIPAA-compliant solution for outpatient facilities that allows providers to prescribe medications, and review and order tests electronically. It integrates with Netsmart EHRs but can be used as a stand-alone solution. OrderConnect is certified for Electronic Prescribing of Controlled Substances (EPCS). It digitizes the prescribing process and closes critical security gaps by providing a single location to view information.

similar_products.short_desc: Practice Fusion is a cloud-based ambulatory EHR in the U.S. for independent practices. Try for free.
similar_products.features:
Practice Fusion is a cloud-based ambulatory EHR platform in the U.S. supporting over 20,000 medical practices in delivering better care to over 5 million patients a month. With a best-in-class satisfaction rate, Practice Fusion is committed to delivering intuitive and easy-to-use health IT solutions to independent medical practices.

Access on most any device, intuitive charting, seamless e-prescribing, integrated policy support, hundreds of lab and imaging connections. Try for free.

similar_products.short_desc: Prescribe online with InSync's EMR integrated eRx platform. Mobile friendly and directly connected to SureScripts for easy access.
similar_products.features: Our EMR integrated e-prescribing for Mental Health, Substance Abuse,  OB/GYN, PTOTST and Primary Care providers is mobile-friendly for ease of access. Features include Eligibility and Formulary Checks, Medication History, EPCS, ePA, RTPB, SureScripts connected and APPRISS Integration for PMDP Checking. The end result is more accurate, easily-filled prescriptions for you and your practice.

similar_products.short_desc: Electronic Health Record (EHR), Practice Management (PM), Medical Billing (RCM), TeleHealth and Healthcare Messaging Solution
similar_products.features: CharmHealth is a online web-based, MU Stage 3 - 2015 Edition Certified, HIPAA compliant, collaboration driven, ambulatory electronic health record (EHR), Practice Management (PM) and Medical Billing (RCM) solution that dramatically improves quality of care for patients.  CharmHealth products include TeleHealth solution for remote patient care, and Connect platform for healthcare messaging and communication.

similar_products.short_desc: APRIMA offers the fastest and most flexible EHR to support and enhance clinical care for patients.
similar_products.features: APRIMA EHR is a market leading, award-winning EHR loved by physicians and office staff.  APRIMA is used with great success by physicians in over 70 specialties including primary care, numerous surgical specialties, and many more. It is also highly adapted to and well-used in many settings, from typical medical offices, to home/palliative settings, FQHCs, and more. The system offers EHR, PM, patient portal, telehealth, prescribing, population health, integrated EDI and so much more.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Electronic Medical Records software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Electronic Medical Records tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Electronic Medical Records software (EMR) automates the documentation, storage and retrieval of patient records. EMR software streamlines data entry, automates diagnosis and CPT code selection, minimizes required paper records, reduces transcription costs, provides up-to-date patient histories and reduces the turnaround time for patient visits and retrieving lab results. Using Electronic Medical Records solutions, doctors, offices and healthcare organizations save time, reduce medical errors, perform less paperwork and provide more accurate diagnoses for their patients. Electronic Medical Records software is related to Healthcare Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Hospital Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Hospital Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Hospital Management software automates processes including billing, appointments, scheduling, regulatory compliance and financial auditing within hospitals. These applications offer integration across the financial, clinical, and operational elements of a healthcare practice and enable users to optimize their office workflow and reduce their operational expenses. Hospital Management software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Medical Lab software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software, .

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Medical Practice Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Medical Practice Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Medical Practice Management software automates activities such as patient care, scheduling, billing, claims processing and other related operations for medical practices. By streamlining office workflows, doctors and their staff are able to spend more time with patients and less time on administrative tasks. Medical Practice Management applications can be utilized by private practices, community health centers, long term care and behavioral health facilities, hospitals and other health care organizations. Medical Practice Management software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Patient Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Patient Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Patient Management software incorporates solutions for bed availability management, patient tracking throughout the facility, be it a hospital or a smaller healthcare clinic, and patient queue management for various healthcare organizations. For related software solutions see Patient Case management software and Healthcare Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Pharmacy software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Pharmacy tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Pharmacy software helps to manage the operations of retail, medical, and long term care pharmacies. Features of these applications include prescription processing, point of sale, and electronic signature capture. Pharmacy software helps to increase the efficiency and speed of filling prescriptions. Pharmacy software is related to Healthcare Management software, Long Term Care software and Medical Practice Management software.

related_products.short_desc: Self-service appointment scheduling with the world's friendliest scheduling tool, so you can save time for the rest of your to-do list.
related_products.features: Save time and keep your patients organized with Acuity's HIPAA-compliant, self-service scheduling solution. From the moment a patient schedules an appointment with you, Acuity sends customized confirmations, delivers text reminders, stores SOAP notes, lets patients reschedule based on your availability, and processes payments. You can even set up video conferencing, so you can interface with your patients remotely. With Acuity, your day-to-day runs more smoothly!

related_products.short_desc: Make the switch today to see why 100,000+ health and wellness entrepreneurs trust SimplePractice to run their business.
related_products.features: Focus on clients while SimplePractice does the rest. Maximize your availability by giving clients the option to request appointments online. After you approve a request, you can send paperless intakes and insurance forms directly from the Client Portal. Set up AutoPay to get paid on time, every time. Reduce no-shows with unlimited appointment reminders. Work on-the-go with our mobile app and integrated telehealth platform. Sign up for a free, 30-day trial today to try it out for yourself.

related_products.short_desc: Mental health EMR/EHR & therapy notes software for practices of all sizes. Lots of features & reports. Easy to use. Free to try.
related_products.features:
EHR practice management software with Wiley Planners add-on, Telehealth for online therapy, mobile responsive interface, client portal, DSM/ICD codes, progress notes, treatment plans, discharge notes, review & co-sign notes, custom forms.  
Billing features: PQRS, claims & ERA/EOB, superbills, credit card service, batch invoice/claims.
Sync with Google/iCal. Voice, text, email reminders. 
Tons of reports included: Payroll, Staff Billing, etc. 
Unlimited document storage, unlimited support.

related_products.short_desc: VOTED BEST VALUE AWARD!!! Top Choice for Practice Management! We make running your practice EASY, ORGANIZED and SECURE. Try Us Free!
related_products.features: VOTED BEST VALUE AWARD By Capterra!!! Top Choice for Practice Management!  Personalized. Efficient. Complete. Online practice management exactly the way you want it. Offering live online chat & video sessions, custom questionnaires & forms, email messaging, scheduling and calendar, billing and invoicing, treatment plans, and more. Try Us Today to see if you like it as much as our current members do!! Now offering 14 Day Free Trial! (No credit card required).

TherapyNotes simplifies administrative work, giving practitioners more time and energy to focus on providing effective care for their clients.

related_products.short_desc: DrChrono cloud-based mobile EHR with PM includes live claims feed, real time eligibility checks, custom templates and appt reminders.
related_products.features: DrChrono's all-in-one cloud-based mobile EHR comes with speech-to-text and custom templates/forms to chart effectively. With DrChrono's practice management and medical billing software you get a live claims feed for billing and payment processing, HCFA/Superbill generation, and e-fax integration. Real-time eligibility checks help you check patients' information, and you can send custom appointment reminders through email, SMS, or phone. For students please visit DrChrono University.

related_products.short_desc: Optimize the patient care experience for behavior & mental health patients with RXNT's cloud-based Practice Management and EHR systems.
related_products.features: RXNT's cloud-based healthcare software optimizes the behavioral and mental health patient care experience. Increase productivity and improve RCM with the integrated PM system, and streamline your practice workflows with the certified EHR solution. Providers get real-time health and prescription history at the point-of-care. 'Smart' keys and forms enhance customization and eliminate redundancy for maximum efficiency. And, single sign-on (SSO) simplifies operations for multiple locations.

related_products.short_desc: CareLogic is web-based Electronic Health Record (EHR) system for behavioral health and human services organizations.
related_products.features: CareLogic is a web-based and easy-to-use Electronic Health Record (EHR) platform designed for enterprise behavioral health and human services organizations. Our highly configurable EHR platform helps improve outcomes, drive efficiencies and demonstrate performance. Capabilities include scheduling, intake, treatment planning, service documentation, ePrescribing, consumer engagement, telehealth, billing and reporting.

related_products.short_desc: Therasoft Practice Management with integrated Teletherapy. Mobile apps with secure video and payments for Client & Therapist.

Struggling with your UNPAID CLAIMS? Try our Receivables Management service. Ask about our Telehealth Bundle with Marketing, Management, Clinical and Billing - all-in-one COMPREHENSIVE package. A professional website. Secure Video. Credit card processing. Mobile Apps for Clinicians and clients in  Android & iOS. ePrescribe available for psychiatrists

Our electronic medical records, practice management and billing software is especially designed to meet mental health and substance abuse provider's needs. Customizable workflows and dashboards, group therapy, patient portal, integrated scheduling, billing, and e-prescribing, integrated telemedicine and mobile ready.

With non-physician provider pricing starting at $80, there's no reason not to join 75,000 providers using Kareo. With Kareo you can schedule appointments, verify insurance eligibility, send e-claims, receive e-insurance payments, manage collections, store documents online, and print custom reports.

similar_products.short_desc: Improve clinical outcomes, increase your efficiency, and run a more profitable practice with Valant's Behavioral Health EHR Software.
similar_products.features: Valant's Behavioral Health EHR enables you to provide exceptional care and run a successful practice. Valant is designed to increase your administrative and clinical efficiency. related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Electronic Medical Records software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Electronic Medical Records tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Electronic Medical Records software (EMR) automates the documentation, storage and retrieval of patient records. EMR software streamlines data entry, automates diagnosis and CPT code selection, minimizes required paper records, reduces transcription costs, provides up-to-date patient histories and reduces the turnaround time for patient visits and retrieving lab results. Using Electronic Medical Records solutions, doctors, offices and healthcare organizations save time, reduce medical errors, perform less paperwork and provide more accurate diagnoses for their patients. Electronic Medical Records software is related to Healthcare Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

related_categories.description: Hospital Management software automates processes including billing, appointments, scheduling, regulatory compliance and financial auditing within hospitals. These applications offer integration across the financial, clinical, and operational elements of a healthcare practice and enable users to optimize their office workflow and reduce their operational expenses. Hospital Management software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Medical Lab software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software, .

related_categories.description: Medical Billing software manages patient billing and collections for the medical industry. Hospitals, clinics, and doctors offices use these applications to centralize and automate essential business processes including: accounts receivable, payment processing, patient data sharing, document management, electronic claims, collections, and financial reporting. Medical Billing solutions typically allow for the tracking of patient demographics, background data, and insurance information. Medical Billing software is related to Chiropractic software, Claims Processing software, Dental software, Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Lab software, Medical Practice Management software and Medical Scheduling software.

related_categories.description: Medical Practice Management software automates activities such as patient care, scheduling, billing, claims processing and other related operations for medical practices. By streamlining office workflows, doctors and their staff are able to spend more time with patients and less time on administrative tasks. Medical Practice Management applications can be utilized by private practices, community health centers, long term care and behavioral health facilities, hospitals and other health care organizations. Medical Practice Management software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

Doctors and administrators use Medical Scheduling software to manage their appointment calendars, staff scheduling, patient records, and billing and invoicing. Medical Scheduling software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Lab software, Medical Billing software and Medical Practice Management software.

related_categories.description: Medical Transcription software enables doctors to transcribe patient notes via voice dictation. Doctors and administrative personnel use Medical Transcription applications to speed the process of converting spoken notes into formal records. Typically Medical Transcription software provides automation tools facilitating fast and accurate transcriptions along with process oriented functions that allow efficient, accurate record management. Medical Transcription software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software and Medical Practice Management software.
